UniprotID	P16442
Accession	P16442;B0JDB9;O14758;Q14490;Q53I57;Q6ISD4;Q6KFZ2;Q70V27;Q99484;Q99485;Q9NY01;Q9UQ68;Q9UQ69
EntryName	BGAT_HUMAN
ProteinName	Histo-blood group ABO system transferase (Fucosylglycoprotein 3-alpha-galactosyltransferase) (Fucosylglycoprotein alpha-N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase) (Glycoprotein-fucosylgalactoside alpha-N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase) (EC 2.4.1.40) (Glycoprotein-fucosylgalactoside alpha-galactosyltransferase) (EC 2.4.1.37) (Histo-blood group A transferase) (A transferase) (Histo-blood group B transferase) (B transferase) (NAGAT) [Cleaved into: Fucosylglycoprotein alpha-N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase soluble form]
GeneName	ABO
Length	354
Function	This protein is the basis of the ABO blood group system. The histo-blood group ABO involves three carbohydrate antigens: A, B, and H. A, B, and AB individuals express a glycosyltransferase activity that converts the H antigen to the A antigen (by addition of UDP-GalNAc) or to the B antigen (by addition of UDP-Gal), whereas O individuals lack such activity.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus; Golgi stack membrane; Secreted
Disorder	0.0888,0.1583,0.2034,0.1399,0.1643,0.1554,0.0985,0.1229,0.1702,0.1554,0.1007,0.0765,0.0443,0.0227,0.0194,0.0258,0.0151,0.0100,0.0099,0.0085,0.0062,0.0042,0.0039,0.0027,0.0034,0.0027,0.0023,0.0030,0.0032,0.0030,0.0034,0.0034,0.0038,0.0059,0.0079,0.0115,0.0093,0.0153,0.0240,0.0433,0.0300,0.0341,0.0568,0.0443,0.0543,0.0555,0.1028,0.1969,0.2094,0.1823,0.1070,0.1137,0.1942,0.1671,0.1449,0.0835,0.0985,0.1731,0.1229,0.0749,0.0380,0.1048,0.1643,0.2364,0.2783,0.2817,0.1852,0.1791,0.1791,0.1162,0.1206,0.2034,0.2034,0.1349,0.1275,0.0817,0.0929,0.0835,0.0967,0.0631,0.0568,0.0888,0.0888,0.0454,0.0240,0.0125,0.0202,0.0356,0.0356,0.0148,0.0240,0.0136,0.0141,0.0088,0.0084,0.0130,0.0205,0.0334,0.0151,0.0134,0.0151,0.0253,0.0349,0.0313,0.0646,0.0543,0.1137,0.0568,0.0605,0.0341,0.0341,0.0248,0.0248,0.0240,0.0443,0.0424,0.0244,0.0188,0.0099,0.0115,0.0115,0.0117,0.0073,0.0053,0.0054,0.0054,0.0066,0.0070,0.0096,0.0092,0.0079,0.0107,0.0093,0.0148,0.0143,0.0141,0.0163,0.0240,0.0168,0.0198,0.0223,0.0119,0.0198,0.0443,0.0817,0.0870,0.0676,0.0690,0.0398,0.0473,0.0483,0.0676,0.0929,0.0835,0.0817,0.0909,0.0929,0.1399,0.1501,0.1528,0.2364,0.2364,0.2680,0.2715,0.1914,0.1823,0.1349,0.0929,0.1092,0.1583,0.0690,0.0734,0.1184,0.0719,0.1206,0.0909,0.0835,0.0817,0.0605,0.0631,0.0835,0.0483,0.0765,0.1373,0.0618,0.0605,0.0704,0.0870,0.1476,0.0749,0.0433,0.0888,0.0948,0.0581,0.0967,0.0555,0.0433,0.0287,0.0188,0.0168,0.0163,0.0146,0.0244,0.0191,0.0198,0.0194,0.0300,0.0281,0.0275,0.0188,0.0389,0.0443,0.0494,0.0258,0.0240,0.0235,0.0506,0.0506,0.0372,0.0618,0.1007,0.0555,0.0851,0.0967,0.1275,0.0581,0.0704,0.0719,0.0676,0.0676,0.1028,0.1115,0.1399,0.0631,0.1137,0.1070,0.1115,0.0948,0.1476,0.2884,0.2918,0.2849,0.3774,0.3566,0.2399,0.1611,0.2988,0.3910,0.3983,0.4119,0.4149,0.4292,0.3019,0.2399,0.2680,0.1823,0.2783,0.2645,0.1611,0.0851,0.0734,0.0704,0.0704,0.0443,0.0555,0.1048,0.1184,0.1070,0.1048,0.0592,0.0568,0.0555,0.0433,0.0543,0.0948,0.1643,0.2129,0.1731,0.1373,0.1791,0.2988,0.3053,0.2752,0.2918,0.3
